item.title: package.json 与 package-lock.json
item.description: package.json 与 package-lock.json package.json 描述项目所需要的各种模块以及配置信息，可以手动编写，也可以在项目根目录用 npm init 自动生成 { "name": "tech-doc-hugo", "version": "0.0.1", "description": "Hugo theme for technical documentation.", "main": "none.js", "scripts": { "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1" }, "repository": { "type": "git", "url": "git+https://github.com/google/docsy-example.git" }, "author": "", "license": "ISC", "bugs": { "url": "https://github.com/google/docsy-example/issues" }, "homepage": "https://github.com/google/docsy-example#readme", "dependencies": {}, "devDependencies": { "autoprefixer": "^9.8.6", "postcss-cli": "^7.1.2" } } package.json 文件要求必须包括name 和 version 属性 author：作者，是在 npmjs.org 网站上的有效账户名 main：指定加载入口，默认值时模块根目录下的 index.
